location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government that William Bruce has received a report from the Pattamai Barbara[ Barbara Patamai] that it was pursued for a considerable time by pirates upon entering the Gulf and that its commander sighted a fleet of fifteen sail off the island of Carrack [Khārk, Jazīreh-ye].
